Name: Beat Blast
About the game: BULLET HELL + MUSIC + ROGUELITE = BEAT BLAST The music you make becomes your abilities A Musical Journey Fight against big bosses, unlock tons of items and try to escape the MIDIverse, a virus-ridden technical realm where music takes physical form. The MIDIverse is full of abilities that can be combined to support hundreds of different styles of play. At the heart of it all is your song; a looping beat that can be tweaked at any time to completely change the rhythm of the gameplay. No two runs are the same and each run has its own soundtrack...one that you create. ...Full of Challenges If the MIDIverse doesnâ€™t present enough of a challenge, you can test your skills against other players in weekly high score and speedrun competitions. Groove to your own beats and see how far you can go. Can you create a song that can best the worst the MIDIverse has to offer? Can you help spot on his journey home?
